summary: "It was more than just a comet because of what it brought to his life: direction, beauty, meaning. There are many who couldn't...
body: “It was more than just a comet because of what it brought to his life: direction, beauty, meaning. There are many who couldn’t understand, and sometimes he walked among them. But even in his darkest hours, he knew in his heart that someday it would return to him, and his world would be whole again…” - OTH

reblog.comment: “It was more than just a comet because of what it brought to his life: direction, beauty, meaning. There are many who couldn’t understand, and sometimes he walked among them. But even in his darkest hours, he knew in his heart that someday it would return to him, and his world would be whole again…” - OTH

tags: เกมล่าบัลลังก์
summary: Game of Thrones Almost Featured a Love Triangle Between Arya Stark, Jon Snow, and Tyrion Lannister
title: Game of Thrones Almost Featured a Love Triangle Between Arya Stark, Jon Snow, and Tyrion Lannister
excerpt: According to George R.R. Martin's original outline, the two men's "passion" for Arya would ultimately "lead to a deadly rivalry between Tyrion and Jon Snow."
description:
A weird plot line which, in retrospect, would have required major revisions in other elements of the narrative as we know it.

Fortunately, GRRM realized that this wasn’t such a good idea and ASoIaF evolved in its current form.

reblog.comment:

summary:
“To the glistening eastern sea, I give you Queen Lucy the Valiant.”
“You’ve left out one of the chief characters -Samwise the...
body:
“To the glistening eastern sea, I give you Queen Lucy the Valiant.”


“You’ve left out one of the chief characters -Samwise the Brave. I want to hear more about Sam.”


“There are all kinds of courage. It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.”


“She tried so hard to be brave, to be fierce as a wolverine and all.”

reblog.comment:

the house of black and white
summary:
The Waif: You entered into a devil's bargain with Jaqen H'ghar. It takes a toll.
Arya Stark: No, Jaqen isn't the devil.
The...
body:
The Waif: You entered into a devil's bargain with Jaqen H'ghar. It takes a toll.
Arya Stark: No, Jaqen isn't the devil.
The Waif: When it comes to how far he's willing to push you to get what he wants, he's certainly no saint.

title: Son of Fire, Born of Ice
description:
by Aemon_BlackFyre

Jon leaves WinterFell, goes to Essos, finds out to truth, goes beyond the Wall finds it true enemy

Words: 11004, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

blog.name: jackoshadows
blog.title: Jak O' the Shadows
blog.description: I’m not going to swear an oath I can’t uphold. Talk about my father if you want. Tell me that’s the attitude that got him killed. But when enough people make false promises, words stop meaning anything. Then there are no more answers - only better and better lies. And lies won’t help us in this fight - Jon Snow.

tags: Big bro and his little sis!
summary: Jon and his warrior princess Arya. Love it! And the end....chills. If there is one thing I desperately looking forward to next...
caption:
Jon and his warrior princess Arya. Love it! And the end….chills.

If there is one thing I desperately looking forward to next season it’s these two meeting again. Then Jon/Ghost, Jon/Sam and Jon/Bran.

I am damned pleased that Arya is not in that courtyard scene with Sansa and Dany and she will get a separate meeting with Jon.

reblog.comment:
